everyone.title: Turn Meeting Notes Into To-Do Lists
everyone.valueProposition: Stop manually sorting through meeting notes! Paste your notes and instantly get an organized checklist with owners, deadlines, and priorities.
howItWorks: You paste your meeting notes (or use our sample)
AI reads through and identifies all the action items
AI figures out who owns each task and when it's due
AI assigns priority levels based on urgency words
You get a clean, organized checklist

developers.title: 10_meeting_notes_to_actions.py
developers.valueProposition: Structured extraction from unstructured text. Learn how AI can parse messy meeting notes and identify actionable tasks with context.
developers.howItWorks: This example demonstrates text processing and structured data extraction. The AI analyzes meeting notes, identifies action-oriented language, extracts key information (owner, deadline, priority), and returns structured JSON data that gets formatted into a readable checklist.
keyConcepts: Text Processing: Analyzing unstructured natural language
Structured Extraction: Converting text to structured data
Entity Recognition: Finding owners, deadlines, and priorities
JSON Output: Returning data in a machine-readable format
Priority Inference: Detecting urgency from language cues

structure: Parse JSON from response (handle markdown wrapping)

experts.title: 10_meeting_notes_to_actions.py - Structured Extraction
experts.architecture: Demonstrates structured extraction from unstructured text. Uses schema-guided prompting to get JSON output, then formats for display. Shows error handling for JSON parsing and fallback strategies.
experts.fullCode:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import asyncio
import json
from pathlib import Path
from amplifier_foundation import load_bundle

SAMPLE_NOTES = """
Product Planning Meeting - Q1 2024 Launch
Attendees: Sarah (PM), John (Eng), Maria (Design)

Action Items:
1. John will update the landing page by Friday
2. Sarah needs to review the API docs ASAP
3. Maria to create social media assets by Monday
"""

async def extract_action_items(meeting_notes: str) -> dict:
    foundation_path = Path(__file__).parent.parent
    foundation = await load_bundle(str(foundation_path))
    provider = await load_bundle(str(foundation_path / 'providers' / 'anthropic-sonnet.yaml'))
    
    composed = foundation.compose(provider)
    prepared = await composed.prepare()
    session = await prepared.create_session()
    
    prompt = f"""Extract action items from these notes as JSON:
    {meeting_notes}
    
    Format: {{"action_items": [{{"task": "...", "owner": "...", "deadline": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low"}}]}}
    """
    
    async with session:
        response = await session.execute(prompt)
    
    # Parse JSON from response
    start = response.find('{')
    end = response.rfind('}')
    json_text = response[start:end+1]
    return json.loads(json_text)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    result = asyncio.run(extract_action_items(SAMPLE_NOTES))
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
